== Introduction ==
The Winterize project began 2013-02-09.  Everything is just an idea so far, and early blueprints are being written to guide exploratory prototypes.

The mailing list is accessed by joining the Winterize team and subscribing to the mailing list:
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~winterize-users|Winterize users team]]</nowiki>

Those interested in working on the team should first sign up to the mail list and begin engagement there.

The Winterize project is being developed at:
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/winterize|Winterize project]]</nowiki>
